aboutMe.title: ## About Me
aboutMe.description: I was born in Argentina and am currently living in Mexico City. I am {{birthday}} years old. My favorite activities are hanging out with friends, reading, and programming. My goal is to explore beyond what any human has ever reached.
aboutMe.quote: We must make the impossible possible
